name: Alone man
description:
Description:

Just run and kill enemies. By killing enemies, you are pumped to kill them even faster.

Please subscribe me:  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCNxc6CuyJ5FkqeMVBHUjmZg

Control:

LMB- shot

MMB(Middle mouse button) - change of gravity

RMB - spider web (like spider-man, hehe)

WASD - walking

SPACE - jump
